comments:
Testing for Platform.Samples.Logging_Examples.testsuite failed. The samples 
can be run but not able to attach to them from the UI (Attach to Java Process).
Note: Logging is enabled in the Preferences.

Similar behavior was seen on Linux while testing Java Profiler Agent with IAC.

This is a duplicate of bug 113477.


*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 113477 ***

I just tried this on the 200511170100 driver by launching LoggingAgentTest both
inside and outside of the workbench and in both cases I was able to attach to it
using IAC/RAC and get the log records.
